scripts.prepublish: git submodule init && git submodule update --remote && git submodule status
scripts.wasm-as: for f in testsuite/*.wast; do ../../WebAssembly/binaryen/bin/wasm-as $f > wasm/$(basename ${f} .${f##*.}).wasm; done
scripts.sexpr-wasm: for f in testsuite/*.wast; do ../../WebAssembly/sexpr-wasm-prototype/out/sexpr-wasm --spec $f -o wasm/$(basename ${f} .${f##*.}).json; done
